[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Delivering excellence within our industry is important to us at the Vatex Engineering Services. The high standards and experience of the people we hire is helping us to emerge as leaders in our field.

Makon is a rapidly evolving business and our staff are adaptable, quick thinking and people focused every day which contributes to our ongoing success.

If you’d like to know about the types of opportunities we have on offer, please contact our HR facility via hr@vatexengineering.com or send your Curriculum Vitae to us.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
